Waves spinner

Variables

$spinner-waves-class: "#{$spinner-class}-waves"
$spinner-waves-size: 30px
$spinner-waves-deg: 25deg

Just add class -spinner-waves.

You need to add -addon elements inside this spinner.
The quantity is unlimited.
